author: pcl
msg: OPENJPA-262. Added test case for lifecycle and tx registries in BrokerFactories. Also discovered that BEFORE_PERSIST listeners (and possibly a couple of others) were not being invoked; fixed-by-inspection and simplified the registration of types in the lifecycle event handler.

author: bernt
msg: DERBY-2145 Remove the no more needed PreparedStatement in EmbedDatabaseMetaData.getFunctionColumns()
